notesStmt.note: The original text file wlc420_ps.txt was provided by the Groves Center. The file has the MD5 hash: d31a 6a6e 9afa bf82 272c 2efb 0522 a12e and was dated 25 Jan 2016. Six transcription notes (5,7,F) have been moved to the noted character (Lev 11:42.4, Judg 18:30.11, Isa 9.6.1, Ps 80:14.3, Job 38:13.5, Job 38:15.2) to produce the file wlc420_ps_td.txt for conversion to Unicode and XML by the program WLC2XML. The only other changes to the Groves Center text are: The book names in English and Hebrew of the Jewish Publication Society Tanach and book abbreviations from the New Revised Standard Version have been added. MC code 32 added as atnah hafukh by Steve Salisbury, 30 Sep 2021. The atnah hafukh codepoint, x05a2, has been added to the character table; it does not appear in WLC 4.20.
